title: neevE naneDa
sahitya:
nIvE nanneDa jEsitE nE nevaritO delpudunayya



anupallavi



 bhavAbhAva mahAnubhAva shrI rAmacandra bhAvaja janaka nA bhAvamu delisiyu



caraNam 1



 kOrina kOrika lIDEru nanucu ninnu ArAdhincina nannu Aradi beTTuDa 

meragAdu nAdu nEramEmi nannElukOra I lOkamuna ninka

   

caraNam 2



 bhaktilO shrI rAmabhakti mElani shiva shakti santatamu viraktitO nutijEya 

shakti jUci nija bhaktulu pogaDaga vyaktini jUci nA shakti galigenu

   

caraNam 3



 patita pAvana sammatamuna sujana sangati sEyuTaku samarahita rAma nAmamu 

satatamu sEya nI vratamu gOriti gAni nata janaka kulAbja hita tyAgarAjunipai
